content: Is there a list of IP addresses we can whitelist for the test toolkit running at https://inferno.healthit.gov/onc-certification-g10-test-kit , so that our security team can allow requests from the test-kit to reach our development/testing environments ?

The inferno folks can give you the official answer, but we (Epic) have had these two IPs in our IP allow list (for several months) and have been successful testing:

34.225.213.213 (inferno-dev.healthit.gov)
52.20.119.0 (inferno.healthit.gov)

You may not need the dev IP, but I find it useful to include so you can do pre-release testing.
